transcription: Does height matter?  I think it depends on what height you are that I'm quite tall so yes, height does matter like I have a person that can help anyone shorter than me like I do prefer tall guys so yeah  make a difference really it's really what's in the heart is what really counts everything else color height like clothing style everything else doesn't really matter yep you have to make me laugh so do you want to go for a drink? there we go oh my god thank you but I'm shorter than you though so it doesn't matter okay very nice  I love you and keep me happy  personality but I do think that initial attraction of how you meet somebody you would be physically attracted to them and for me they were taller than me like I actually had I broke up with him but this was not the reason this was not a reason the reason was not that he was shorter but everything can happen you know height doesn't matter nothing matters in the end of the day  because I'm quite tall so yeah for me they have to be taller Rebecca I love you so much yeah here it is will you marry me Rebecca yes she said yes  Tom Cruise is coming to you and he is shorter than you. Will you date him? Yeah, probably.
